page.title: 12Hythe - Southampton Water.
page.content: The main industry in our survey area was{water sports}eg.sailing and small boat building. {House building}is another prominant industry as Hythe is a growing residential area. A{marina village}is under consruction on the waterside.It has hydraulic locks through which boats enter and leave. There are already boats inside the locked areas although it will be many years before the marina is finished .An old metal anchor outside the Marina Information Centre was found during dredging operations. The adjoining village of Hythe has a good shopping centre which would cater for all the needs of a growing community. Hythe is commercially well equipped to cope with a growing population.
